content: I´m a beginner front-end developer and, even though I´ve never tried React so far, this is definitely on my to-do list… Meanwhile, I´ve been doing some reading on this topic in order to learn what the buzz is all about… Your article is, hands-down, the best introductory piece on React I´ve came across. The virtual DOM approach is really clever and I can see why the trade-off pays off! It all makes sense to me now. Thank you!
